data.name: ApplyDescription
data.value: Applies the input settings to the designated window.

data.name: ApplyDisplayName
data.value: Apply Input Settings

data.name: ApplyResultDescription
data.value: Receives the result. True on success, False otherwise.

data.name: ApplyResultDisplayName
data.value: Result

data.name: ApplyWindowHandleDescription
data.value: Win32 Handle of a window to apply the input settings to. Window, Browser, and UiElement are also acceptable.

data.name: ApplyWindowHandleDisplayName
data.value: Window Handle

data.name: BlockKeyboardInputDescription
data.value: Specifies whether to block human keyboard input or not. True to block. False not to.

data.name: BlockKeyboardInputDisplayName
data.value: Block Keyboard Input

data.name: BlockMouseInputDescription
data.value: Specifies whether to block human mouse input or not. True to block. False not to.

data.name: BlockMouseInputDisplayName
data.value: Block Mouse Input

data.name: ConfigureDescription
data.value: Configures the input settings for the windows designated by the Apply Input Settings activity.

data.name: ConfigureDisplayName
data.value: Configure Input Settings

data.name: ConfigureKeyboardLayoutArgumentValidationError
data.value: Preferred Keyboard Layout is not set while Force Keyboard Layout is set to True.

data.name: DisableInputMethodEditorDescription
data.value: Specifies whether to forcibly turn off Input Method Editor or not. True to turn off. False not to.

data.name: DisableInputMethodEditorDisplayName
data.value: Disable Input Method Editor

data.name: ForceKeyboardLayoutDescription
data.value: Specifies whether to force the preferred keyboard layout if available or not. True to force. False not to.

data.name: ForceKeyboardLayoutDisplayName
data.value: Force Keyboard Layout

data.name: GetStateConversionModeDescription
data.value: Receives the Conversion Mode compartment value.

data.name: GetStateConversionModeDisplayName
data.value: Conversion Mode

data.name: GetStateDescription
data.value: Gets the keyboard layout and the compartment values set in the designated window.

data.name: GetStateDisplayName
data.value: Get Keyboard State

data.name: GetStateKeyboardLayoutDescription
data.value: Receives the language ID of the keyboard layout.

data.name: GetStateKeyboardLayoutDisplayName
data.value: Keyboard Layout

data.name: GetStateKeyboardOpenCloseDescription
data.value: Receives the Keyboard OpenClose compartment value. True when IME is turned on. False otherwise.

data.name: GetStateKeyboardOpenCloseDisplayName
data.value: Keyboard OpenClose

data.name: GetStateWindowHandleDescription
data.value: Win32 Handle of a window to retrieve the keyboard state from. Window, Browser, and UiElement are also acceptble.

data.name: GetStateWindowHandleDisplayName
data.value: Window Handle

data.name: InitializeDescription
data.value: Initializes the keyboard extension activity package.

data.name: InitializeDisplayName
data.value: Initialize Keyboard Extension

data.name: InputCategory
data.value: Input

data.name: OutputCategory
data.value: Output

data.name: PreferredKeyboardLayoutDescription
data.value: Language ID of the preferred keyboard layout to be set if the Force Keyboard Layout property is set to True.

data.name: PreferredKeyboardLayoutDisplayName
data.value: Preferred Keyboard Layout

data.name: RestoreDescription
data.value: Restores the input settings for the UI elements designated by the Apply activity.

data.name: RestoreDisplayName
data.value: Restore Input Settings

data.name: RestoreWindowHandleDescription
data.value: Win32 Handle of a window to restore. Window, Browser, and UiElement are also acceptable. If omitted, all applied windows will be restored.

data.name: RestoreWindowHandleDisplayName
data.value: Window Handle

data.name: SetStateConversionModeDescription
data.value: Conversion Mode compartment value to set. Specify either this or the Keyboard OpenClose compartment value.

data.name: SetStateConversionModeDisplayName
data.value: Conversion Mode

data.name: SetStateDescription
data.value: Sets one of compartment values of the keyboard to the designated window.

data.name: SetStateDisplayName
data.value: Set Keyboard State

data.name: SetStateInputArgumentValidationError
data.value: Both Keyboard OpenClose and Conversion Mode cannot be specified at the same time.

data.name: SetStateKeyboardOpenCloseDescription
data.value: Keyboard OpenClose compartment value to set. Specify either this or the Conversion Mode compartment value.

data.name: SetStateKeyboardOpenCloseDisplayName
data.value: Keyboard OpenClose

data.name: SetStatePreviousConversionModeDescription
data.value: Receives the Conversion Mode compartment value previously set.

data.name: SetStatePreviousConversionModeDisplayName
data.value: Previous Conversion Mode

data.name: SetStatePreviousKeyboardOpenCloseDescription
data.value: Receives the Keyboard OpenClose compartment value previously set.

data.name: SetStatePreviousKeyboardOpenCloseDisplayName
data.value: Previous Keyboard OpenClose

data.name: SetStateWindowHandleDescription
data.value: Win32 Handle of the target window. Window, Browser, and UiElement are also acceptable.

data.name: SetStateWindowHandleDisplayName
data.value: Window Handle

data.name: ToggleSequenceDescription
data.value: Specifies the key combination to toggle on/off state of the input settings. Virtual key names are accepted. Plus sign combines keys.

data.name: ToggleSequenceDisplayName
data.value: Toggle Sequence

data.name: UninitializeDescription
data.value: Uninitializes the keyboard extension activity package.

data.name: UninitializeDisplayName
data.value: Uninitialize Keyboard Extension

data.name: WindowHandleArgumentValidationError
data.value: Null value cannot be specified to Window Handle (Window, Browser, or UiElement).
